name: Software Engineer Lua / LuaJIT
description:
We are seeking candidates for permanent research and development positions in the area of compiler technologies and toolchains

Background

The Datacom business unit is responsible for delivering top class networking hardware. Currently, the scale of Data Communication service code is huge. Typical products have tons of code which is written in low-level language. The code abstraction is low and the redundancy is high while a single bug has a huge commercial cost. It becomes more and more difficult to maintain high telecom reliability

We want to build the core software competitiveness aiming for greatly improving developing experience of tens of thousands programmers across Huawei and even more beyond. The team will be focusing on research and development in the area of compilation technology, language design,translators, static analysis and other adjacent areas. You will get an opportunity to become a known open source contributor and a limitless career path in a Fortune-100 company

About the project:

The research will aim to develop a compiler/tools/runtime for a new general purpose programming language. A significant fraction of our work is currently dedicated to source-to-source translation from existing high-level languages to our new programming language

Position requirements:

  • Proficient in script language compilation technologies, and mastering Lua/Luajit compilation implementation is preferred
  • Have a proficient command of script language performance optimization technologies, including technologies for improving script language performance and reducing memory usage. Successful experience in Lua language optimization is preferred
  • Have a basic command of script language-related engineering tools and methods, including running hotspot analysis and memory usage query
  • Have at least five years of C/Lua development experience, especially in the open source community development of Lua and LuaJIT

Position Responsibility:

  • Evaluate the risks of Lua open source vulnerabilities and develop a fix solution
  • Enhance Lua software engineering capabilities, such as testability, tailorability, and auxiliary tools for problem locating
  • Be responsible for the function adaptation, version compatibility, running performance optimization, and memory usage optimization of Lua/LuaJIT on x86/ARM/PPC, and outperform competitors in performance
  • Based on the business characteristics, research the technical solution to optimize the efficient development and operation of the existing inventory Lua code at low cost
  • Track the development trend of script languages in the industry, evolve script languages suitable for Data Communication products, and consistently outperform competitors in performance

Conditions:

  • Professional and career development opportunity
  • Commercial medical insurance
  • Modern office in the city center
  • Employment according to the Labor Code of the Russian Federation
